role.description: User role - must be either 'admin', 'driver', or 'employee'

parameters.description: ID of the price list to update

parameters.description: Filter services by minimum base price (inclusive)

parameters.description: Filter services by maximum base price (inclusive)

parameters.name: is_area_based
parameters.description: Filter services by whether they are area-based (true/false)

get.summary: Get all clients with optional filters

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Filter clients by first name (partial match)

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Filter clients by last name (partial match)

parameters.name: phone_number
parameters.description: Filter clients by phone number (partial match)

parameters.name: street_name
parameters.description: Filter clients by street name (partial match)

parameters.name: street_number
parameters.description: Filter clients by street number (partial match)

parameters.name: postal_code
parameters.description: Filter clients by postal code (partial match)

remarks.example: Molestias perferendis omnis quae deserunt est consequuntur sunt doloremque.

first_name.description: The first name of the client (required).

last_name.description: The last name of the client (required).

street_name.description: The street name of the client (nullable).

street_number.description: The street number of the client (nullable, must be numeric).

postal_code.description: The postal code of the client (nullable, must be numeric).

phone_number.description: The phone number of the client (required, must be numeric).

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the client (required).

get.summary: Get a paginated list of complaints with optional filters
get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all complaints with optional filtering.

parameters.name: order_carpet_id
parameters.description: Filter complaints by order carpet ID (exact match)

parameters.name: complaint_details
parameters.description: Filter complaints by complaint details (partial match)

remarks.example: Iure ipsum minima ut porro dolorem voluptatibus officia. Neque est aspernatur et quia. Dolorem molestiae officiis quia saepe. Rerum ea repellat consequatur quis autem odio dolorum.

get.summary: Get a specific complaint
get.description: Retrieves a specific complaint by its ID, including related order carpet and order details.

put.description: Updates a specific complaint by its ID.

delete.description: Deletes a specific complaint by its ID.

post.description: Stores a new complaint for a specific order carpet.

get.summary: List all drivers with optional filters
get.description: Retrieve all drivers in the system with pagination and optional filters.

parameters.name: license_number
parameters.description: Filter drivers by license number (partial match)

parameters.name: vehicle_details
parameters.description: Filter drivers by vehicle details (partial match)

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Filter drivers by first name (partial match)

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Filter drivers by last name (partial match)

get.summary: Get specific driver information
get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific driver, including their associated user details.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing driver, including license number and vehicle details.

items.example: The license number must be a valid format.
The vehicle details field is required.

get.summary: Get list of all order carpets
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of all order carpets along with related order details. Filters can be applied to narrow down the results.

parameters.name: qr_code
parameters.description: Filter by QR code. Partial matches are supported.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter order carpets by status (exact match)

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Filter by the associated order ID.

parameters.name: measured_at
parameters.description: Filter by the measured date/time of the carpet. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

post.description: Creates a new order carpet and associates it with an existing order.

remarks.example: Nesciunt quia temporibus ut. Dolores adipisci ducimus molestiae ut distinctio. Unde necessitatibus aut id quis ut.

items.example: The order id field is required.

get.summary: Get order carpet by ID
get.description: Retrieves the details of a specific order carpet by its ID, including related order information.

remarks.example: Nesciunt quia temporibus ut. Dolores adipisci ducimus molestiae ut distinctio. Unde necessitatibus aut id quis ut.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing order carpet by its ID.

remarks.example: Iure ipsum minima ut porro dolorem voluptatibus officia...
Iure ipsum minima ut porro dolorem voluptatibus officia...

post.description: Upload a photo for a specific order carpet

delete.description: Delete a specific carpet photo with example usage

get.summary: Assign QR code to a carpet
Find carpet by QR code
get.description: Retrieves details of a carpet based on its QR code, including related order, photos, and complaint information.

parameters.name: qr_code
parameters.description: QR code of the carpet to search for

remarks.example: Iure ipsum minima ut porro dolorem voluptatibus officia...

get.summary: Retrieve the paginated list of orders
get.description: Fetches a paginated list of all orders along with related client, driver, services, and order carpets. Filters can be applied to narrow down the results.

remarks.example: Nesciunt quia temporibus ut. Dolores adipisci ducimus molestiae ut distinctio. Unde necessitatibus aut id quis ut.

post.description: Creates a new order with the specified client, driver, schedule date, price list, status, and services.

remarks.example: Velit et esse provident sed. Ut molestias magni occaecati molestiae dignissimos voluptatem sint. Beatae est fugiat consequatur totam facere deleniti dolor.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific order by ID
get.description: Returns the order details for the specified order ID, including related client, driver, services, price list, carpets, delivery confirmation, and payment information.

remarks.example: Nesciunt quia temporibus ut. Dolores adipisci ducimus molestiae ut distinctio. Unde necessitatibus aut id quis ut.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing order based on the provided request data.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: ID of the order to update

remarks.example: Nesciunt quia temporibus ut. Dolores adipisci ducimus molestiae ut distinctio. Unde necessitatibus aut id quis ut.

items.example: The selected client id is invalid.

post.description: Confirms the delivery of an order with either signature or data confirmation and processes the payment
Updates the order status to undelivered

post.summary: Validate QR Code and mark status as 'measured'
post.description: This endpoint validates a QR code and updates the status of the associated order carpet to 'measured'.

200.description: QR code validated and status updated to 'measured'.

message.example: Qr code validated successfully and status updated to measured

post.summary: Validate QR Code and mark status as 'completed'
post.description: This endpoint validates a QR code and updates the status of the associated order carpet to 'completed'.

200.description: QR code validated and status updated to 'completed'.

message.example: Qr code validated successfully and status updated to completed!

post.summary: Validate QR Code and mark status as 'delivered'
post.description: This endpoint validates a QR code and updates the status of the associated order carpet to 'completed'.

200.description: QR code validated and status updated to 'completed'.

message.example: Qr code validated successfully and status updated to delivered!

post.description: This endpoint allows sending a custom SMS message to a specified phone number.

message.description: The content of the SMS message
message.example: Hello, this is a test message!
Failed to send SMS: Error message

get.summary: Get a list of users with optional filters
get.description: Retrieve all users in the system with pagination and optional filters.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: Filter users by first name (partial match)

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Filter users by last name (partial match)

post.description: Add a new user to the system

get.summary: Get a user's information
get.description: Retrieve details about a specific user

put.description: Update details of a specific user

delete.description: Remove a user from the system
